about.desc0: I am a web developer from South Korea. I started my career at 2019 and developed document editing softwares for desktop and web environment.
about.desc1: My main interest is building an easy-to-use UIs with simple design. These days, I am focusing on building React apps.
about.desc2: My recent experiences are mostly related to front-end. However, I am trying to develop my back-end capabilities to be a full-stack engineer.
